author: sebor
msg: ARFLAGS.narrow): Added options to BUILDMODE whenever a "narrow"
BUILDTYPE (i.e., one of { 8s, 11s, 12s, and 15s } is specified.
ARFLAGS.narrow): Commented out options implicit in the default
ARFLAGS.wide): Autodetected whether the default invocation of
the compiler produces narrow (32-bit) or wide (64-bit) code and
set options accordingly, avoiding specifying redundant options.

author: sebor
msg: * sunpro.config: Added a Makefile file type tag for emacs.

msg: added call to replenish from auth service; used when account is frozen; note replenish service will not run if not configured, regardless of how it is called
